creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: one of a pair of ornaments; one end has a large cone with a swirl and floral design with a dot background; cone is attached to half-circle piece; this piece has a fish with a swirl background etched into it; connecting piece has thin wire wrapped around it; connecting piece has a circle of wire loops; these loops have leaf-like, thin pieces dangling down
title: Ornament, one of a pair
